Title.caption: Put the Story in Order: Say Goodnight, Lizzy

Instructions.caption: Drag the events from the story in the order in which they happened. Click on the caption to hear it read aloud. When your done, click Check My Answers.

Answer.caption: Lizzy asks her dad to read her and Sam another story.
Dad reads Sam and Lizzy a bedtime story.
Dad falls asleep before Lizzy does.
Lizzy asks her dad to stay with her untill she falls asleep.
